metadata.title: CVE-2021-23214 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Server processes unencrypted bytes from man-in-the-middle

notes.note: leosilva> PostgreSQL 9.3 is end of life upstream, and no updates are are available. Marking as deferred in -esm-main releases. mdeslaur> Plan is for postgresql-13 to be removed from jammy, marking as deferred for now.

criterions.comment: postgresql-13 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '13.5-0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
